povcalnetR

Source: vignettes/povcalnetR.Rmd
povcalnetR.Rmd
library(povcalnetR)

The povcalnetR package allows to easily query the PovcalNet API from R.

Here are a few examples to get you started:

Retrieve ONE country with default parameters

povcalnet(country = "ALB")
#> # A tibble: 5 x 31
#>   country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>   <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#> 1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#> 2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#> 3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#> 4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#> 5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#> # ... with 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>, data_type <chr>,
#> #   is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>, ppp <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>, poverty_gap <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>, median <dbl>,
#> #   mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>, decile1 <dbl>,
#> #   decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>, decile5 <dbl>,
#> #   decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>, decile9 <dbl>,
#> #   decile10 <dbl>

Retrieve MULTIPLE countries with default parameters

povcalnet(country = "all")
#> # A tibble: 1,753 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#>  2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#>  3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#>  4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#>  5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#>  6 DZA          Algeria      MNA         N                     1988
#>  7 DZA          Algeria      MNA         N                     1995
#>  8 DZA          Algeria      MNA         N                     2011
#>  9 AGO          Angola       SSA         N                     2000
#> 10 AGO          Angola       SSA         N                     2008
#> # ... with 1,743 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>
povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"))
#> # A tibble: 53 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#>  2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#>  3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#>  4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#>  5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#>  6 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1981
#>  7 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1984
#>  8 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1987
#>  9 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1990
#> 10 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1993
#> # ... with 43 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

Retrieve countries from a specific region or income group

# Get countries from ECA region
eca <- get_countries("ECA")
povcalnet(country = eca)
#> # A tibble: 497 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#>  2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#>  3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#>  4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#>  5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#>  6 ARM          Armenia      ECA         N                     1996
#>  7 ARM          Armenia      ECA         N                     1999
#>  8 ARM          Armenia      ECA         N                     2001
#>  9 ARM          Armenia      ECA         N                     2002
#> 10 ARM          Armenia      ECA         N                     2003
#> # ... with 487 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

# Get countries from Lower Income group
lic <- get_countries("LIC")
povcalnet(country = lic)
#> # A tibble: 118 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 BEN          Benin        SSA         N                     2003
#>  2 BEN          Benin        SSA         N                     2011
#>  3 BEN          Benin        SSA         N                     2015
#>  4 BFA          Burkina Faso SSA         N                     1994
#>  5 BFA          Burkina Faso SSA         N                     1998
#>  6 BFA          Burkina Faso SSA         N                     2003
#>  7 BFA          Burkina Faso SSA         N                     2009
#>  8 BFA          Burkina Faso SSA         N                     2014
#>  9 BDI          Burundi      SSA         N                     1992
#> 10 BDI          Burundi      SSA         N                     1998
#> # ... with 108 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

Change poverty line

povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"),
          povline = 10)
#> # A tibble: 53 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#>  2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#>  3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#>  4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#>  5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#>  6 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1981
#>  7 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1984
#>  8 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1987
#>  9 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1990
#> 10 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1993
#> # ... with 43 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

Select specific years

povcalnet(country = c("ALB"),
          year = c(2002, 2012))
#> # A tibble: 2 x 31
#>   country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>   <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#> 1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#> 2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#> # ... with 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>, data_type <chr>,
#> #   is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>, ppp <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>, poverty_gap <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>, median <dbl>,
#> #   mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>, decile1 <dbl>,
#> #   decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>, decile5 <dbl>,
#> #   decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>, decile9 <dbl>,
#> #   decile10 <dbl>
povcalnet(country = c("ALB"),
          year = 2002)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 31
#>   country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>   <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#> 1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#> # ... with 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>, data_type <chr>,
#> #   is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>, ppp <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>, poverty_gap <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>, median <dbl>,
#> #   mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>, decile1 <dbl>,
#> #   decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>, decile5 <dbl>,
#> #   decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>, decile9 <dbl>,
#> #   decile10 <dbl>

Change coverage

povcalnet(country = "all",
          coverage = "urban")
#> # A tibble: 96 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1980
#>  2 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1986
#>  3 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1987
#>  4 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1991
#>  5 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1992
#>  6 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1993
#>  7 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1994
#>  8 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1995
#>  9 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1996
#> 10 ARG          Argentina    LAC         U                     1997
#> # ... with 86 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>
povcalnet(country = "all",
          coverage = "rural")
#> # A tibble: 49 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1981
#>  2 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1984
#>  3 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1987
#>  4 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1990
#>  5 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1993
#>  6 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1996
#>  7 CHN          China        EAP         R                     1999
#>  8 CHN          China        EAP         R                     2002
#>  9 CHN          China        EAP         R                     2005
#> 10 CHN          China        EAP         R                     2008
#> # ... with 39 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

Aggregation

povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"),
          aggregate = TRUE)
#> You specified `aggregate = TRUE`. Aggregation is only possible
#>             over a common reference year: The `fill_gaps` parameter will be
#>             forced to `TRUE`
#> # A tibble: 15 x 9
#>    region_title region_code request_year poverty_line  mean headcount
#>    <chr>        <chr>              <dbl>        <dbl> <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 XX           XX                  2015          1.9 332.    0.00727
#>  2 XX           XX                  2013          1.9 288.    0.0185 
#>  3 XX           XX                  2012          1.9 256.    0.0647 
#>  4 XX           XX                  2011          1.9 234.    0.0790 
#>  5 XX           XX                  2010          1.9 218.    0.112  
#>  6 XX           XX                  2008          1.9 186.    0.148  
#>  7 XX           XX                  2005          1.9 151.    0.185  
#>  8 XX           XX                  2002          1.9 116.    0.316  
#>  9 XX           XX                  1999          1.9  91.7   0.401  
#> 10 XX           XX                  1996          1.9  83.5   0.416  
#> 11 XX           XX                  1993          1.9  65.9   0.565  
#> 12 XX           XX                  1990          1.9  56.8   0.660  
#> 13 XX           XX                  1987          1.9  57.4   0.603  
#> 14 XX           XX                  1984          1.9  46.9   0.750  
#> 15 XX           XX                  1981          1.9  35.5   0.878  
#> # ... with 3 more variables: poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>,
#> #   population <dbl>

Fill gaps when surveys are missing for specific year

povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"),
          fill_gaps = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 60 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      XX          N                     1981
#>  2 CHN          China        XX          A                     1981
#>  3 CHN          China        XX          R                     1981
#>  4 CHN          China        XX          U                     1981
#>  5 ALB          Albania      XX          N                     1984
#>  6 CHN          China        XX          A                     1984
#>  7 CHN          China        XX          R                     1984
#>  8 CHN          China        XX          U                     1984
#>  9 ALB          Albania      XX          N                     1987
#> 10 CHN          China        XX          A                     1987
#> # ... with 50 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>

PPP

povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"),
          ppp = c(50, 100),
          coverage = "national")
#> # A tibble: 21 x 31
#>    country_code country_name region_code coverage_type request_year
#>    <chr>        <chr>        <chr>       <chr>                <dbl>
#>  1 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     1996
#>  2 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2002
#>  3 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2005
#>  4 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2008
#>  5 ALB          Albania      ECA         N                     2012
#>  6 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1981
#>  7 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1984
#>  8 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1987
#>  9 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1990
#> 10 CHN          China        EAP         A                     1993
#> # ... with 11 more rows, and 26 more variables: data_year <dbl>,
#> #   data_type <chr>, is_interpolated <dbl>, use_microdata <dbl>,
#> #   ppp <dbl>, poverty_line <dbl>, mean <dbl>, headcount <dbl>,
#> #   poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>, watts <dbl>, gini <dbl>,
#> #   median <dbl>, mld <dbl>, polarization <dbl>, population <dbl>,
#> #   decile1 <dbl>, decile2 <dbl>, decile3 <dbl>, decile4 <dbl>,
#> #   decile5 <dbl>, decile6 <dbl>, decile7 <dbl>, decile8 <dbl>,
#> #   decile9 <dbl>, decile10 <dbl>
povcalnet(country = c("ALB", "CHN"),
          ppp = c(10, 20),
          povline = 4,
          aggregate = TRUE,
          coverage = "national")
#> You specified `aggregate = TRUE`. Aggregation is only possible
#>             over a common reference year: The `fill_gaps` parameter will be
#>             forced to `TRUE`
#> # A tibble: 15 x 9
#>    region_title region_code request_year poverty_line  mean headcount
#>    <chr>        <chr>              <dbl>        <dbl> <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 XX           XX                  2015            4 64.3      0.911
#>  2 XX           XX                  2013            4 56.0      0.934
#>  3 XX           XX                  2012            4 50.0      0.947
#>  4 XX           XX                  2011            4 46.1      0.957
#>  5 XX           XX                  2010            4 43.2      0.962
#>  6 XX           XX                  2008            4 37.3      0.974
#>  7 XX           XX                  2005            4 30.7      0.987
#>  8 XX           XX                  2002            4 24.1      0.992
#>  9 XX           XX                  1999            4 19.6      0.996
#> 10 XX           XX                  1996            4 18.2      0.997
#> 11 XX           XX                  1993            4 14.3      0.997
#> 12 XX           XX                  1990            4 13.6      0.997
#> 13 XX           XX                  1987            4 13.9      0.997
#> 14 XX           XX                  1984            4 11.9      0.997
#> 15 XX           XX                  1981            4  9.82     0.997
#> # ... with 3 more variables: poverty_gap <dbl>, poverty_gap_sq <dbl>,
#> #   population <dbl>
